trans-unit.source: Provides utility methods to compose and parse pack URI objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce metodi di utilità per comporre e analizzare oggetti URI di tipo pack.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether two pack URIs are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se due URI di tipo pack sono equivalenti.

trans-unit.source: If both `firstPackUri` and `secondPackUri` are `null`, ComparePackUri returns 0.
trans-unit.target: Se entrambi `firstPackUri` e `secondPackUri` sono `null`, ComparePackUri restituisce 0.

trans-unit.source: When comparing pack URIs, a null URI is always less than a non-null URI.
trans-unit.target: Quando si confrontano URI di tipo pack, un URI null è sempre minore di un URI diverso da null.

trans-unit.source: For cases where `firstPackUri` and `secondPackUri` are both absolute pack URIs, ComparePackUri performs the comparison.
trans-unit.target: Per i casi in cui `firstPackUri` e `secondPackUri` sono entrambi assoluto, URI di tipo pack ComparePackUri esegue il confronto.

trans-unit.source: The first pack URI.
trans-unit.target: Il primo URI di tipo pack.

trans-unit.source: The second pack URI.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo URI di tipo pack.

trans-unit.source: A signed integer indicating the relationship between firstPackUri and secondPackUri.
trans-unit.target: Un intero con segno che indica la relazione tra firstPackUri e secondPackUri .

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Valore

trans-unit.source: Meaning
trans-unit.target: Significato

trans-unit.source: Less than 0
trans-unit.target: Minore di 0

trans-unit.source: firstPackUri is less than secondPackUri.
trans-unit.target: firstPackUriis less than secondPackUri.

trans-unit.source: firstPackUri is equivalent to secondPackUri.
trans-unit.target: firstPackUriequivale a secondPackUri .

trans-unit.source: Greater than 0
trans-unit.target: Maggiore di 0

trans-unit.source: firstPackUri is greater than secondPackUri.
trans-unit.target: firstPackUriè maggiore di secondPackUri .

trans-unit.source: Either firstPackUri or secondPackUri is not an absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Either firstPackUri or secondPackUri is not an absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: -or- Either firstPackUri or secondPackUri do not begin with a "pack://" scheme.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - entrambi firstPackUri o secondPackUri non iniziano con una "pack: / /" dello schema.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether two package part [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se due parte del pacchetto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] sono equivalenti.

trans-unit.source: If both `firstPartUri` and `secondPartUri` are `null`, ComparePartUri returns 0.
trans-unit.target: Se entrambi `firstPartUri` e `secondPartUri` sono `null`, ComparePartUri restituisce 0.

trans-unit.source: When comparing <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)], a null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] is always less than a non-null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Quando si confrontano <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)], un valore null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] è sempre minore di un valore non null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: For cases where `firstPartUri` and `secondPartUri` are both relative <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> URIs, ComparePartUri performs the comparison.
trans-unit.target: Per i casi in cui `firstPartUri` e `secondPartUri` sono entrambi relativo <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>URI, ComparePartUri esegue il confronto.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the first <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del primo <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the second <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del secondo <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates the relationship between firstPartUri and secondPartUri.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che indica la relazione tra firstPartUri e secondPartUri .

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Valore

trans-unit.source: Meaning
trans-unit.target: Significato

trans-unit.source: Less than 0
trans-unit.target: Minore di 0

trans-unit.source: firstPartUri is less than secondPartUri.
trans-unit.target: firstPartUriis less than secondPartUri.

trans-unit.source: firstPartUri is equivalent to secondPartUri.
trans-unit.target: firstPartUriequivale a secondPartUri .

trans-unit.source: Greater than 0
trans-unit.target: Maggiore di 0

trans-unit.source: firstPartUri is greater than secondPartUri.
trans-unit.target: firstPartUriè maggiore di secondPartUri .

trans-unit.source: firstPartUri or secondPartUri is not a valid part [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] syntax.
trans-unit.target: firstPartUrio secondPartUri non è una parte valida [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] sintassi.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new pack URI that points to a package.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo pacchetto di URI che punta a un pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` may not be specified as `null` or empty.
trans-unit.target: `packageUri`non può essere specificato come `null` o vuoto.

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for Create.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente vengono illustrati i casi di esempio per la creazione.

trans-unit.source: |`packageUri`|Returned pack URI| |------------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg| Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process.
trans-unit.target: | `packageUri`| URI di tipo pack restituito | |------------------|-----------------------| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg | pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg| | ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc | pack://ftp:, ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc| |file:///d:/Packages/mypackage2.pkg| pack://file:, d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg| Composizione di un URI di tipo pack è un processo costituito da più passaggi.

trans-unit.source: For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,).
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un passaggio nella creazione di un URI di tipo pack è per sostituire i caratteri di barra rovesciata (/) del `packageUri` con una virgola (,).

trans-unit.source: For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla conversione di stringhe e come URI di tipo pack vengono creati, vedere Appendice&4; "Esempi di conversione di stringhe" e Appendix b.&3; "Composizione di un URI di tipo Pack" nella specifica Open Packaging Conventions disponibile per il download all'indirizzo [specifiche e Scarica licenza](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: The URI of the referenced <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'URI del tipo di riferimento <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The pack URI for the referenced by the given packageUri.
trans-unit.target: URI di tipo pack per il a cui fa riferimento il determinato packageUri .

trans-unit.source: packageUri is .
trans-unit.target: packageUriis .

trans-unit.source: packageUri is not an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: packageUrinon è un URI assoluto.

trans-unit.source: Creates a pack URI given a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] and the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a part in the package.
trans-unit.target: Crea un URI di base di tipo pack un <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] di una parte nel pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` may not be specified as null or empty.
trans-unit.target: `packageUri`non può essere specificato come null o vuoto.

trans-unit.source: If `partUri` is `null`, the returned pack URI points to the package.
trans-unit.target: Se `partUri` è `null`, l'URI di tipo pack restituito punta al pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for the Create method.
trans-unit.target: La tabella seguente illustra i case di esempio per il metodo Create.

trans-unit.source: |`packageUri`|`partUri`|Returned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml| Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process.
trans-unit.target: | `packageUri`|`partUri`| URI di tipo pack restituito | |------------------|---------------|-----------------------| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/page2.xaml| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/a/page4.xaml| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/%41/%61.xml| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/%25XY.xml| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg | **null**| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg| | ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc |/a/mydoc.xaml| pack://ftp:, ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/Packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.XAML| pack://file:, d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml| Composizione di un URI di tipo pack è un processo costituito da più passaggi.

trans-unit.source: For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,).
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un passaggio nella creazione di un URI di tipo pack è per sostituire i caratteri di barra rovesciata (/) del `packageUri` con una virgola (,).

trans-unit.source: For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla conversione di stringhe e come URI di tipo pack vengono creati, vedere Appendice&4; "Esempi di conversione di stringhe" e Appendix b.&3; "Composizione di un URI di tipo Pack" nella specifica Open Packaging Conventions disponibile per il download all'indirizzo [specifiche e Scarica licenza](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> in the package.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> nel pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: The pack URI of the given <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: URI di tipo pack del determinato <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: packageUri is .
trans-unit.target: packageUriis .

trans-unit.source: packageUri is not an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: packageUrinon è un URI assoluto.

trans-unit.source: -or- partUri is not a valid part URI syntax.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - partUri non è una sintassi URI valida per la parte.

trans-unit.source: Creates a pack URI given a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a part in the package, and a "#" fragment to append.
trans-unit.target: Crea un URI di base di tipo pack un <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] di una parte del pacchetto e un frammento "#" da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` may not be specified as `null` or empty.
trans-unit.target: `packageUri`non può essere specificato come `null` o vuoto.

trans-unit.source: If `partUri` is `null`, the returned pack URI points to the package.
trans-unit.target: Se `partUri` è `null`, l'URI di tipo pack restituito punta al pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: `fragment` cannot be an empty string but can be specified as `null`.
trans-unit.target: `fragment`non può essere una stringa vuota, ma può essere specificata come `null`.

trans-unit.source: When not specified as `null`, the `fragment` string must begin with a '#' character.
trans-unit.target: Quando non viene specificato come `null`, `fragment` stringa deve iniziare con un carattere '#'.

trans-unit.source: For more information of the syntax of `fragment` references, see Section 3.5 "Fragment" of [RFC 3986](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla sintassi dei `fragment` riferimenti, vedere sezione 3.5 "Fragment" di [RFC 3986](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt).

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for the Create method.
trans-unit.target: La tabella seguente illustra i case di esempio per il metodo Create.

trans-unit.source: |`packageUri`|`partUri`|`fragment`|Returned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page1.xaml|#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml|**null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml|**null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml|**null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml|**null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page5.xaml|#summary|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summary| |http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?pkg04|/page1.xaml|#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null**|**null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml|**null**|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml|#xref|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xref| Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process.
trans-unit.target: | `packageUri`|`partUri`|`fragment`| URI di tipo pack restituito | |------------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------------| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/page1.xaml|#intro| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intro| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/page2.xaml| **null**| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/a/page4.xaml| **null**| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/%41/%61.xml| **null**| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/%25XY.xml| **null**| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/a/page5.xaml|#summary| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summary| | http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?pkg04 |/page1.xaml|#intro| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intro| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg | **null**|**null**| pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg| | ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc |/a/mydoc.xaml| **null**| pack://ftp:, ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/Packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.XAML|#XRef| pack://file:, d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xref| Composizione di un URI di tipo pack è un processo costituito da più passaggi.

trans-unit.source: For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,).
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un passaggio nella creazione di un URI di tipo pack è per sostituire i caratteri di barra rovesciata (/) del `packageUri` con una virgola (,).

trans-unit.source: For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla conversione di stringhe e come URI di tipo pack vengono creati, vedere Appendice&4; "Esempi di conversione di stringhe" e Appendix b.&3; "Composizione di un URI di tipo Pack" nella specifica Open Packaging Conventions disponibile per il download all'indirizzo [specifiche e Scarica licenza](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> in the package.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] del <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> nel pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: A "#" reference identifying an element within the package part.
trans-unit.target: Riferimento "#" che identifica un elemento all'interno della parte del pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: The pack URI that identifies the specified package, package part, and fragment.
trans-unit.target: URI di tipo pack che identifica il pacchetto specificato, una parte del pacchetto e un frammento.

trans-unit.source: packageUri is .
trans-unit.target: packageUriis .

trans-unit.source: packageUri is not an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: packageUrinon è un URI assoluto.

trans-unit.source: -or- partUri is not a valid part URI syntax.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - partUri non è una sintassi URI valida per la parte.

trans-unit.source: -or- fragment is empty or does begin with "#".
trans-unit.target: - oppure - fragment è vuoto o inizia con "#".

trans-unit.source: Creates a formatted <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> URI.
trans-unit.target: Crea un formattato <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> URI.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> is always referenced from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> root.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] di un <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>fa sempre riferimento dal <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>radice.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> URI is an absolute path that always starts with "/" and conforms to the syntax defined in the [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto restituito <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>URI è un percorso assoluto inizia sempre con "/" ed è conforme alla sintassi definita nel [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for CreatePartUri.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente vengono illustrati i casi di esempio per CreatePartUri.

trans-unit.source: |`partUri`|Returned Part URI| |---------------|-----------------------| |picture1.jpg|/picture1.jpg| |/picture2.jpg|/picture2.jpg| |a/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml| |/b/bar.xaml|/b/bar.xaml|
trans-unit.target: | `partUri`| Ha restituito l'URI della parte | |---------------|-----------------------| |Picture1.jpg|/picture1.jpg| |/Picture2.jpg|/Picture2.jpg| |a/MyDoc.XAML|/a/MyDoc.Xaml| |/b/bar.XAML|/b/bar.Xaml|

trans-unit.source: The URI of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> within the package.
trans-unit.target: L'URI del <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> all'interno del pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: A formatted <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> URI.
trans-unit.target: Formattato <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> URI.

trans-unit.source: Returns the normalized form of a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> URI.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la forma normalizzata di una determinata <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> URI.

trans-unit.source: GetNormalizedPartUri normalizes `partUri` by case-folding to uppercase (<xref:System.String.ToUpperInvariant%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) and returning the result.
trans-unit.target: Normalizza GetNormalizedPartUri `partUri` dalla riduzione case in lettere maiuscole (<xref:System.String.ToUpperInvariant%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) e la restituzione del risultato.</xref:System.String.ToUpperInvariant%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> URI to normalize.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> URI da normalizzare.

trans-unit.source: The normalized form of the given partUri.
trans-unit.target: Forma normalizzata del determinato partUri .

trans-unit.source: partUri is .
trans-unit.target: partUriis .

trans-unit.source: Returns the inner URI that points to the entire package of a specified pack URI.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'URI interno che punta all'intero pacchetto di un URI di tipo pack specificato.

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for GetPackageUri.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente vengono illustrati i casi di esempio per GetPackageUri.

trans-unit.source: |`packUri`|Returned Package URI| |---------------|--------------------------| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.xyz| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?mypackage| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg|http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg| |pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc| |pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|
trans-unit.target: | `packUri`| Ha restituito l'URI del pacchetto | |---------------|--------------------------| | pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml| http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.xyz | | pack://http:, www.proseware.com, packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml| http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?mypackage | | pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg| http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg | | pack://ftp:, ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg| ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc | | pack://file:, d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|

trans-unit.source: The pack URI from which to return the URI of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: URI di tipo pack da cui restituire l'URI di <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The URI of the from the specified packUri.
trans-unit.target: L'URI di dall'oggetto specificato packUri .

trans-unit.source: Returns the URI of a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> within a specified pack URI.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'URI di un <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> all'interno di un URI di tipo pack specificato.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> URI is relative to the package root and is an absolute path that always starts with "/" and conforms to the syntax defined in the [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto restituito <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>URI è relativo alla radice del pacchetto e rappresenta un percorso assoluto che inizia sempre con "/" ed è conforme alla sintassi definita nel [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for GetPartUri.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente vengono illustrati i casi di esempio per GetPartUri.

trans-unit.source: |`packUri`|Returned Part URI| |---------------|-----------------------| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg|null| |pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|/a/picture.jpg| |pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml|
trans-unit.target: | `packUri`| Ha restituito l'URI della parte | |---------------|-----------------------| | pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml| | pack://http:, www.proseware.com, packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml| | pack://http:, www.proseware.com, mypackage.pkg|null| | pack://ftp:, ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|/a/picture.jpg| | pack://file:, d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml|

trans-unit.source: The pack URI from which to return the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> URI.
trans-unit.target: URI di tipo pack da cui restituire il <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> URI.

trans-unit.source: The URI of the in the given packUri, or if packUri points to a package instead of a .
trans-unit.target: The URI of the in the given packUri, or if packUri points to a package instead of a .

trans-unit.source: Returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the relationship part associated with a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] della parte di relazione associata a un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: `partUri` must identify either the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> ("/") or a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> that is not a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> part.
trans-unit.target: `partUri`deve identificare l'il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>("/") o un <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>ovvero non una <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>parte.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parts, see Section 9.3 "Relationships" in the Open Packaging Conventions Specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>parti, vedere la sezione 9.3, "Relazioni" in Open Packaging Conventions Specification per il download all'indirizzo [specifiche e Scarica licenza](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri*> of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> to return the URI for the associated <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri*>del <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> per restituire l'URI per la proprietà associata <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri*>

trans-unit.source: The URI of the part associated with the identified by partUri.
trans-unit.target: L'URI del parte associata con il identificato da partUri .

trans-unit.source: partUri is .
trans-unit.target: partUriis .

trans-unit.source: partUri syntax is not valid for a package part URI.
trans-unit.target: partUrisintassi non è valida per un URI della PackagePart.

trans-unit.source: -or- partUri is an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - partUri è un URI assoluto.

trans-unit.source: -or- partUri references a relationship part.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - partUri fa riferimento a una parte di relazione.

trans-unit.source: Returns the relative [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] between two specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il relativo [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] tra due <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for GetRelativeUri.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente vengono illustrati i casi di esempio per GetRelativeUri.

trans-unit.source: |`sourcePartUri`|`targetPartUri`|Returned relative URI| |---------------------|---------------------|---------------------------| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg|picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|/mydoc/picture.jpg|../picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|/mydoc/images/picture.jpg|../images/picture.jpg|
trans-unit.target: | `sourcePartUri`|`targetPartUri`| URI relativo restituito | |---------------------|---------------------|---------------------------| |/MyDoc/markup/Page.XML|/MyDoc/markup/Picture.jpg|Picture.jpg| | / mydoc/markup/page.xml|/mydoc/picture.jpg|... /Picture.jpg| | / mydoc/markup/page.xml|/mydoc/images/picture.jpg|... /Images/Picture.jpg|

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the source part.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] della parte di origine.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the target part.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] della parte di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The relative [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] from sourcePartUri to targetPartUri.
trans-unit.target: The relative [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] from sourcePartUri to targetPartUri.

trans-unit.source: sourcePartUri or targetPartUri is .
trans-unit.target: sourcePartUrior targetPartUri is .

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*> from the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> with a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*>dal <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> con un oggetto specificato [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> property of a relationship part must identify either the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package%2A> ("/") or a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> that is not a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>proprietà di una parte della relazione deve identificare l'il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package%2A>("/") o un, <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>ovvero non un <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the package part "/files/document.xaml" is the source owner of the relationship part "/files/_rels/document.xaml.rels", calling GetSourcePartUriFromRelationshipPartUri with the `relationshipPartUri` parameter of "/files/_rels/document.xaml.rels" returns the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> of "/files/document.xaml".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se la parte del pacchetto "/ /files/document.xaml" è il proprietario dell'origine della parte di relazione "/ files/_rels/document.xaml.rels", chiamata GetSourcePartUriFromRelationshipPartUri con il `relationshipPartUri` parametro di "/ files/_rels/document.xaml.rels" restituisce la <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>di "/ /files/document.xaml".</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the relationship part to return the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*> from.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] della parte di relazione per restituire il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*>da.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*>

trans-unit.source: The of the from the relationship with the specified relationshipPartUri.
trans-unit.target: Il di della relazione con l'oggetto specificato relationshipPartUri .

trans-unit.source: relationshipPartUri is .
trans-unit.target: relationshipPartUriis .

trans-unit.source: relationshipPartUri is an absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: relationshipPartUriè un oggetto assoluto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: -or- relationshipPartUri syntax is not valid for a .
trans-unit.target: - oppure - relationshipPartUri sintassi non è valida per un .

trans-unit.source: -or- relationshipPartUri does not reference a relationship part.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - relationshipPartUri non fa riferimento a una parte di relazione.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*> of the relationship part references another relationship part (not valid, see Remarks).
trans-unit.target: - o - <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*> della relazione parte fa riferimento a un'altra parte di relazione (non è valido, vedere la sezione Osservazioni).

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> part.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se un oggetto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] è il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] di un <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> parte.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] to check for a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> part.
trans-unit.target: Il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] per cercare un <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> parte.

trans-unit.source: if partUri identifies a part; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: -or- partUri is an invalid syntax.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - partUri è un valido sintassi.

trans-unit.source: Returns a part URI given a source part URI and a URI with a relative path to a target part.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un URI specificato un URI della parte origine della parte e un URI con un percorso relativo a una parte di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for ResolvePartUri.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente vengono illustrati i casi di esempio per ResolvePartUri.

trans-unit.source: |`sourcePartUri`|`targetUri`|Returned URI| |---------------------|-----------------|------------------| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|picture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|images/picture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/images/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|./picture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|../picture.jpg|/mydoc/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|../images/picture.jpg|/mydoc/images/picture.jpg| |/|images/picture.jpg|/images/picture.jpg|
trans-unit.target: | `sourcePartUri`|`targetUri`| URI restituito | |---------------------|-----------------|------------------| |/MyDoc/markup/Page.XML|Picture.jpg|/MyDoc/markup/Picture.jpg| |/MyDoc/markup/Page.XML|Images/Picture.jpg|/MyDoc/markup/Images/Picture.jpg| | / mydoc/markup/page.xml|. /Picture.jpg|/MyDoc/markup/Picture.jpg| | / mydoc/markup/page.xml|... /Picture.jpg|/MyDoc/Picture.jpg| | / mydoc/markup/page.xml|... /Images/Picture.jpg|/MyDoc/Images/Picture.jpg| |/|Images/Picture.jpg|/Images/Picture.jpg|

trans-unit.source: The URI of the source part, or "/" to designate the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> root.
trans-unit.target: L'URI della parte di origine, o "/" per designare il <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> radice.

trans-unit.source: The relative URI to the target part.
trans-unit.target: URI relativo da parte di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The URI of the target part resolved between the specified SourcePartUri and the targetUri parameters.
trans-unit.target: L'URI della parte di destinazione risolto tra i SourcePartUri e targetUri parametri.

trans-unit.source: sourcePartUri or targetUri is .
trans-unit.target: sourcePartUrior targetUri is .

trans-unit.source: sourcePartUri is not a valid part URI.
trans-unit.target: sourcePartUrinon è un URI della parte valido.

trans-unit.source: -or- targetUri is not a valid relative URI.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - targetUri non è un URI relativo valido.

trans-unit.source: Defines the pack URI scheme name "pack".
trans-unit.target: Definisce l'URI combinazione nome "pack" pack.
